basics.name: Laith Shadeed
basics.label: Code writer & problem-solver with ♥
basics.summary: Professional experience in web application development @Scale using many different programming languages, frameworks and platforms.

work.summary: Alchemist that converts code to money by A/B experimentation.
highlights: Pushing forward the launch of Apple Maps integration with Booking.com. It was a project running for more than two years (Perl).
Leading the revamp of Booking.com annual-employees-event application, it handles the reservation of hotels & flights for thousands of employees (Perl, AngularJS).
Leading the creation of a missing tool: Booking.com application for meeting rooms. It helps hundreds of employees to become more efficient. It was hackathon project for 7 months (Perl, ReactJS).
Back-end support for maps, idea creation for A/B testing experiments with millions users & dollars every single day (Perl).

Part of the daily fire-fighting. Participate in solving live incidents that saves the company millions of dollars. Support +600 engineers on live jabber channel for rollout and live problems. Gave a training on how to do live monitoring using Graphite.
Stack: Perl, Ngnix, MySQL, Puppet, Salt, Redis, shardcached, Hadoop, Graphite and CentOS.

work.summary: Leading the change from legacy PHP & XML gallery to modern NodeJS/PostgresSQL single-page application that serves +200K different domains.
highlights: Back-end JSON APIs (PHP), then later using Javascript/NodeJS.
Automated build script from minifying assets to debian packaging (Bash).
Wrapper for Selenium and JUnit (Java), got replaced later by Robot.
Patching different in-house system components: apache modules (C), video encoding system (Perl), flash video player (Actionscript).
Stack: Git, Knockout.js, Apache, Varnish, Gearman, Redis, Hadoop, Puppet, and Debian.

work.summary: Learning what @Scale means, as part of multi-location development team, delivering products for millions of users that runs on thousands of servers.
highlights: Participated in Maktoob SSO integration with Yahoo! Login (PHP)
Launch Yahoo! News for mobile devices in Arabic which support +4000 devices in 17 countries using Yahoo! Proprietary Blueprint platform (PHP).
Participated in implementing Arabic and Bidirectional script support for Yahoo! Mail (Javascript). The project was in Bangalore, India
Stack: CVS, Subversion, Smarty, Zend Framework, Apache, MySQL, Memcache, Apache Traffic Server, Redhat, Keykey, YCB, MDBM, technologies similar to MongoDB, Firebase and CFEngine

work.summary: Learning what professional software development looks like
highlights: This internship was part of my engineering degree curriculum. Through which I had the chance to create my first .dll file.
Simple file system enumeration application with threading support.
Stack: MS Visual Studio, MS VSS, C++, C, CLucene, MFC, Win32 API, Boost and Qt.

education.institution: Jordan University of Science and Technology
courses: On Dean's List for 5 consecutive semesters, got two scholarships.
As a senior project, designed an Indoor Positioning System using WLAN fingerprinting (software implementation using C#).
